wikipedia_page.main: Vice-Admiral Sir John Gilchrist Thesiger Inglis,  (8 June 1906 – 29 October 1972), sometimes known as Tommy Inglis, was a Royal Navy officer who served as Director of Naval Intelligence from 1954 to 1960. In this capacity, he attempted to cover-up the "Buster Crabb affair" in 1956.

response: * John Gilchrist Inglis (1906–1972), British Royal Navy officer
